title: D'Ambrosio's bizarre pregnancy photo
text:
0 Feb 23, 2017 00:05:18 The Inter defender showed off his unborn baby with his wife in a cleverly staged photograph on Twitter EXTRA TIME 
All couples are excited to announce the arrival of their babies and show off pregnancy pictures on the internet. 
When most pairings post images online, it's usually the woman who sports the baby bump. 
WATCH: Barca youngster signs unreal solo goal 
That was not the case for Inter defender Danilo D'Ambrosio, though, who posted a bizarre yet entertaining picture of his swollen belly, with the caption "Today I feel a little bloated." 
Rather than appear in a sequel to the Arnold Schwarzenegger comedy Junior, D'Ambrosio was posting with partner Enza de Cristofaro to show off their unborn child. â€” Danilo D'Ambrosio (@ddambrosio) February 22, 2017 
D'Ambrosio has played 19 times in Serie A for Inter this season, scoring one goal as Stefano Pioli's side look to turn things around after a poor start under Frank de Boer. Related
